articles.title: Amazon app's AI eyeballs will scan the world and shop stuff for you
articles.author: Nadeem Sarwar
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Lens Live, a new tool that builds upon Amazon Lens, allowing users to identify products by pointing their phone's camera at them. The tool uses generative AI to detect objects and match them against items on sale on Amazon, providing quick comparisons and allowing users to add items directly to their shopping cart. Additionally, the Rufus AI shopping assistant can describe product details and clarify doubts.

articles.title: Viva unveils brand Ambassador challenge winner
articles.author: Anthony
articles.summary: Viva, a brand from Aspira Nigeria Limited, launched an ambassador challenge to promote its Viva Plus Detergent and Viva Dishwashing Liquid. Hafsat Halliru Ismail won the challenge and secured a N5m ambassadorial deal to promote the Viva brand.

articles.title: 40 Inexpensive Swaps For Expensive Brands
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of affordable alternatives to popular name-brand products. It introduces the Nyx Fat Oil Lip Drip as an alternative to the Dior lip oil, the Essence Lash Princess Mascara as a competitor to Too Faced and Benefit mascaras, and Kodak digital camera as alternative to the Canon G7X. It also features Petcube a camera that allows you to check on your pet and talk to them.

articles.title: Run! Lululemon's ABC Pants Are in the "We Made Too Much" Section
articles.author: Blake Bakkila
articles.summary: Lululemon's ABC pants are known for their comfort and versatility, suitable for both office and casual settings. The same technology is applied to the ABC joggers for a more relaxed option.

articles.title: Slideshow: New products from Rudi's Rocky Mountain Bakery, Kellanova and Blackbird Foods
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Food manufacturers are launching frozen innovations. These innovations represent new products in the food industry.

articles.title: X-Design AI 1.0 AI Photo Editor Launches to Solve Product Image Challenges for Etsy and Small E-Commerce Sellers
articles.author: X-Design
articles.summary: Version 1.0 introduces updated features designed to help sellers generate realistic product images. At its core is an AI background generator that replaces plain backdrops with natural scenes, offering options like built-in presets, scene cloning, and custom AI prompts. The upgrade also includes Background Blending, which seamlessly merges the product into the generated scene by adjusting lighting, shadows, and spatial alignment.

articles.title: LG Unveils AI-Powered Smart Home at IFA 2025
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: LG Electronics is unveiling its AI-powered smart home appliances at IFA 2025. The new product lineup includes refrigerators, washers, dryers, and vacuums designed for European lifestyles, along with accessories like the LG Comfort Kit and the AI-powered mobility solution Spielraum to extend the home experience to the car.

articles.title: AGZ Review: Does This Stuff Actually Help You Sleep?
articles.author: Ian Burke
articles.summary: AG1 launched a new sleep supplement called AGZ, priced at $2.64-$2.96 per serving depending on subscription. AGZ aims to improve sleep quality and promote relaxation using ingredients like L-theanine, ashwagandha, magnesium, valerian, and saffron. The supplement is available in Mixed Berry, Chocolate Mint and Chocolate flavors and comes in individual sachets for on-the-go convenience.

articles.title: Should you buy the Galaxy S25 Edge at $400 off its normal price?
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge from $1,099 to $699, making it the cheapest device in the S25 lineup. The S25 Edge is a sleek and lightweight phone with similar specs to the pricier Galaxy S25 Ultra, but has some compromises in camera and battery life compared to other models.

articles.title: I tried Lenovo's rotating display laptop, and it's as wild as it is practical
articles.author: Kyle Kucharski
articles.summary: Lenovo has introduced the ThinkBook VertiFlex, a new 14-inch laptop concept featuring a rotating display that allows users to switch between landscape and portrait orientations. This design differs from Lenovo's earlier rollable laptop concept, offering a simpler, physical rotation mechanism for display adjustment.

articles.title: Future Meets Household: Tineco Showcases Innovative Smart Floor Care Solutions at IFA
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco has launched several new products, including the FLOOR ONE S9 series with Streak Free Scraper and HydroBurst Function, the FLOOR ONE STATION S9 Artist with Smart Refresh Station, the FLOOR ONE S7 Max Pro with green LED lighting, the PURE ONE A90S with 3D Sense Brush, and the CARPET ONE Cruiser. Tineco also introduced the CHIERE ONE Biz and Smart Water Dispenser at IFA 2025.

articles.title: Why the Tesla Model Y is a CarExpert Choice winner
articles.author: Carexpert.com.au
articles.summary: The 'Juniper' Model Y, a substantially different update to its predecessor, maintains its lead in Australia's EV market. It surpasses rivals in key areas, solidifying its position as a top choice.

articles.title: NEXA FLEX Unleashed: Unmatched Innovation and Customization with the Industry-Leading Smart Match Platform
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NEXA launched NEXA FLEX, a new vaping gadget with dual-performance modes and a smart match platform, offering up to 40,000 puffs. The NEXA FLEX pairs with Cool Pod and Visible Pod, has adjustable coolness levels and no e-liquid residue, and was released to the market in September after previews at industry events.

articles.title: BMW iX3: A Smarter, Sustainable Electric SUV
articles.author: Nik Miles
articles.summary: BMW has launched the iX3, its first Neue Klasse production model, featuring an estimated range of 320-380 miles in the US. It has fast charging capability, that adds about 217 miles of range with just 10 minutes plugged in and bidirectional charging making it a mobile energy source. The iX3 interior boasts a 43-inch heads-up projection display and a 17.9-inch driver-oriented screen and sustainable materials using recycled content.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong is Now Available
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: Team Cherry has launched Hollow Knight: Silksong, the sequel to Hollow Knight, on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC via Steam, GOG, Humble Store, and Xbox Game Pass. The game features Hornet's adventure through a new kingdom, battling foes and solving mysteries.

articles.title: Oppo A6 Max Review with Price in Bangladesh
articles.summary: On September 1, 2025, Oppo introduced the A6 Max, a mid-range phone featuring a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 50MP main camera, and a 32MP selfie camera. The A6 Max runs on the Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, has a 7000mAh battery with 80W fast charging, and includes 256GB of UFS storage and 8GB of RAM.

articles.title: Not black and white: Colour Kindle is pretty but imperfect
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Kindle Colorsoft, a new e-reader featuring a color screen. It boasts a seven-inch touchscreen, adjustable backlight, IPX8 waterproofing, and the ability to display book covers and comics in color. The Colorsoft also supports color highlights and the display of various color publications, enhancing the Kindle Unlimited library.

articles.title: Amazon Kindle Colorsoft review: New e-reader adds vibrancy to books but is inferior for black and white text
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: The Colorsoft is a new e-reader option being compared to the Kindle Paperwhite. While it offers color display, it compromises monochrome reading quality with lower contrast and a darker page. Despite retaining benefits like low-glare screen and long battery life, its value depends on the user's content preferences, particularly for those seeking color in black-and-white images or comics.

articles.title: Not black and white: Colour Kindle is pretty but imperfect
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced the Kindle Colorsoft, a new e-reader with a color screen. It features a seven-inch touchscreen, adjustable backlight, IPX8 waterproofing, and displays book covers in full color. The device is similar in design to the Kindle Paperwhite.

articles.title: The Luminar Neo Plugin Easily Fits Into Your Existing Photo Editing Workflow
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Luminar Neo is a plugin designed to enhance photography editing workflow. It is designed to work with existing editing workflows.

articles.title: Roborock Ventures Outdoors With New All-Wheel Drive Lawnmowers
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Roborock introduces new AI-powered, self-driven lawnmowers with four-wheel drive. The company also launches a new in-home vacuum designed to fit under furniture using a clever feature.

articles.title: Digital Silk Highlights Native Advertising Innovations from 2025 Trends Analysis
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Digital Silk unveiled its latest Digital Trends report, "18 Native Ads Examples To Impress Customers In 2025", highlighting native advertising innovations. The report emphasizes the importance of immersive, user-centered messaging and provides strategic insights for brands to create meaningful engagement through contextual relevance and authenticity.

articles.title: Lenovo Unveils Its Complete Portfolio of Ai-Powered Devices and Experiences Across Consumer, Enterprise, and Mobile
articles.summary: Lenovo announced its 'Smarter AI for All' vision and unveiled its AI innovation portfolio at 'Lenovo Innovation World 2025' in Berlin. The company also introduced three new OLED monitors, the Lenovo Legion Pro 32UD-10, 27UD-10, and 27Q-10, targeted at gamers, at IFA 2025.

articles.title: Honor Magic V5: I tested the world's slimmest folding phone and the battery lasted two days
articles.author: Jon Mundy
articles.summary: Honor introduced the Magic V5, a new book-style folding smartphone. It can be used as both a regular-sized smartphone and a larger tablet-like gadget with a price of £1,700. The phone's features aim to address on-the-go spreadsheet wrangling and provide an enhanced experience for emails and watching films.

articles.title: Bettendorf unveils 'Arches' mural
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers a streaming service accessible on phones through the WeAreIowa app.

articles.title: Shop guilt-free this 9.9
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Lazada is promoting its 9.9 Mega Brands Sale. LazMall offers an Authenticity Guarantee to ensure genuine purchases and value for customers. This feature enhances the shopping experience and supports sellers by increasing visibility, leading to strong sales during campaigns.

articles.title: Nike's 'Why do it?' campaign has a Gen Z twist—But branding experts are skeptical, saying it messes with one of the most iconic taglines in history
articles.author: Sydney Lake
articles.summary: Nike has reintroduced its iconic "Just Do It" campaign as "Why Do It?," targeting the younger generation. The campaign, featuring athletes like Carlos Alcaraz and LeBron James, aims to inspire courage and unlock potential through sport.

articles.title: These twin mattress sales can save you up to 70% on a new bed for your dorm or small apartment
articles.author: Jennifer Gonick
articles.summary: Several mattress companies like Avocado, Awara, Bear, Big Fig, Birch, Brooklyn Bedding, Casper, Cocoon by Sealy, DreamCloud, Emma, Helix, Leesa, Mattress Firm, Nectar, Nolah, Plushbeds, Puffy, Purple, Saatva, Siena, Tempur-Pedic and Zoma are offering discounts on their mattresses, including twin and twin XL sizes. DreamCloud's Hybrid mattress, Helix Midnight Mattress, Leesa Sapira Hybrid Mattress, Saatva Classic Mattress, Bear Star Hybrid and Leesa Sapira Chill Hybrid are among the twin mattresses highlighted for their specific features. Customers can use promo codes like LDAY, LABOR, LDW25, and LABORDAY25 to avail discounts.

articles.title: Old name, new car: The production Neue Klasse sedan will be called the BMW i3
articles.summary: BMW has unveiled the all-new BMW iX3 and previewed the Neue Klasse sedan in its production form, to be called the BMW i3. The i3, an electrified version of the new 3-Series, will closely resemble the Vision Neue Klasse concept and is expected to have the same 108.7kWh battery as the iX3. BMW plans to launch 40 new models or updates before 2027.

articles.title: POP Jones Soda tastes pretty OK for a prebiotic drink (not you, ginger)
articles.author: Christian D'Andrea
articles.summary: Jones Soda introduced POP Jones, a new line of prebiotic sodas. The line includes flavors like Orange & Cream, Pineapple Ginger, and Mixed Berry & Kiwi. Reviews indicate varying levels of success among the flavors, with Orange & Cream and Mixed Berry & Kiwi receiving more favorable feedback than Pineapple Ginger.

articles.title: Redmi 15 review: Power-packed phone for entertainment buffs
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Redmi 15 series budget phone in India last week. The new Android phone is now available in stores.

articles.title: You can get Blue Bell on your doorstep in 30 via drone ...
articles.author: Bethany Erickson
articles.summary: Blue Bell is launching its new Classic Pecan Pie Ice Cream flavor, which can be delivered via Wing drones. This service is available in select areas of North Texas through a partnership with Walmart, offering a free pint of the new flavor without delivery fees or minimum purchase requirements from designated Walmart locations.

articles.title: Yugasa Bot: Intelligent AI-Powered Conversations
articles.summary: Yugasa introduces Yugasa Bot, an AI-enabled, NLP-based chatbot. Yugasa Bot delivers human-like interactions across digital touchpoints like websites, mobile apps, Facebook, and WhatsApp. The bot is designed to manage first-level customer interactions.

articles.title: Dyson launches AI robot vacuum, next-gen cleaners at Berlin showcase
articles.author: Jie Ye-eun
articles.summary: Dyson unveiled 11 new products at the Dyson Unveiled event in Berlin, including the Dyson Spot+Scrub AI robot vacuum, a wet-and-dry cleaner that utilizes AI to identify and remove stains. Other launches include the Dyson Clean+Wash Hygiene, a revolutionary wet-and-dry floor cleaner, Dyson HushJet Purifier Compact, Dyson Cool CF1 fan, and Dyson Hot+Cool HF1 fan heater featuring smart app connectivity.

articles.title: Honest Review: TirTir's New AI-Filter Cushion In 27N
articles.author: Buzzfeed Contributor
articles.summary: TirTir launched the Mask Fit AI Filter Cushion, a cushion compact promising an AI-like skin finish. The product is available on Amazon and TirTir's global website for $25, with mini sizes for $15, offering full coverage, hydration, and a silky, smooth finish.

articles.title: Net Promoter Scores are dead—here's a better way to understand what your customers think
articles.author: John Mazur
articles.summary: Rivian restored its signature owl hoot car locking sound after customer feedback on Reddit. Dutch Bros launched new drive-through order preparation procedures to address long wait times. Sephora moved its beauty stations away from store windows to provide customers more privacy when trying out make-up, improving customer experience.

articles.title: Lexus NX For 2026: All-Available FWD Leads Modest Changes
articles.author: Dale Buss
articles.summary: Lexus is introducing updates to its NX line for the 2026 and 2025 model years. The 2026 model year introduces front-wheel drive configurations for the NX 350h and a Premium grade for the Plug-in Hybrid model, while the 2025 model year brought a new Copper Crest finish, Macadamia interior color, standard USB-C ports, and intuitive parking assist.

articles.title: IFA 2025: Motorola brings big battery upgrades to its three latest smartphones
articles.author: Ben Johnston
articles.summary: Lenovo's Motorola is introducing three new handsets: the Moto G06 Power, the Moto G06, and the Edge 60 Neo. The Moto G06 Power features a 7,000mAh battery, and both G06 models have the largest displays on any Moto phone to date, while the Edge 60 Neo receives a battery upgrade and durability improvements like Gorilla Glass 7i.

articles.title: Shop guilt-free this 9.9
articles.summary: Lazada is launching its 9.9 Mega Brands Sale, featuring discounts up to 90%, vouchers up to P2,000, and free shipping, as well as new product launches. The campaign includes the introduction of AI Lazzie, an AI-powered assistant providing personalized recommendations and rewards to shoppers.

articles.title: M&S praised as new 'high street first' product revealed and shoppers say it's 'genius'
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: M&S has launched its new autumn café menu, featuring 22 new items including the Gluten Free Bacon Roll, claimed as a UK high street 'first', and the Halloumi & Avocado Ciabatta. The menu also includes new toasties, drinks, and cakes designed for autumn.

articles.title: Itsu Grocery credits NPD for 20% leap in turnover
articles.author: Dominic Bernard
articles.summary: Itsu's grocery division experienced a 20% turnover increase to £57m in 2024 due to the launch of 68 new products. A significant contributor to this growth was the company's viral soup dumplings, which generated nearly £10m in gross sales. Itsu also maintains focus on its core product, gyoza, which represents a third of their business and continues to grow.

articles.title: I tried Lenovo's rotating display laptop, and it's as wild as it is practical
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Lenovo's ThinkBook VertiFlex showcases a rotating screen concept. This design allows users to switch between portrait and landscape orientations, potentially offering a more versatile user experience.

articles.title: Bell Media expands Shopsense AI partnership to TSN
articles.author: Connie Thiessen
articles.summary: Bell Media and Shopsense AI have expanded their partnership to launch TSN Shop, a new service that enables viewers to purchase merchandise, including network personalities' wardrobe, via on-screen QR codes. The TSN Shop debuted during CFL on TSN's Friday Night Football and will expand to other sports properties, offering brands direct access to fans.

articles.title: I tried Dyson's new haircare products — it's like an IRL shine-filter
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new line of haircare products, including the Omega leave-in conditioning spray, Chitosan multi-use styling spray, and Omega hydrating hair oil. The products aim to reduce hair breakage, provide smooth strands, and hydrate and nourish hair, offering heat protection and shine.

articles.title: This Moisturizer Works Well On My Acne-Prone Skin
articles.author: Shawna Hudson
articles.summary: Vanicream introduces a sensitive skin-friendly version of its original moisturizer. This new formula is designed for acne-prone skin, is noncomedogenic, and contains ceramides, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and squalane. The product is available on Amazon for $13.97.

articles.title: Naver, Kurly launch 'premium' online grocery service Kurly N Mart
articles.author: EO HWAN-HEE
org: National Agricultural Products Quality Management Service
articles.summary: Naver and Kurly have launched Kurly N Mart, an online grocery service, to compete with Coupang in the fresh food delivery sector. This premium marketplace offers a curated selection of groceries, including Kurly's private-label products, with dawn delivery services. The collaboration allows Naver to enter the fresh food market and provides Kurly access to Naver's customer base.

articles.title: 123Invent Inventor Develops New Cleaning Tool for Hard-To-Reach Areas (NJD-2648)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has developed the "EASY HANDHELD BRUSH CLEANER," a new cleaning tool designed to remove dust, dirt, and debris from hard-to-reach areas in homes or commercial establishments. The product is available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers.

articles.title: Sky Mobile's £23 monthly deal for Galaxy S25 FE includes £370 freebies
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new addition to its Galaxy smartphone series, starting at £649. The S25 FE features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 12MP ultra-wide camera, 50MP wide camera, 256GB of storage, a 4,900 mAh battery, and Galaxy AI functions. Sky Mobile offers a deal with free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 FE included with the phone.

articles.title: I Tried an AI Agent That Searched the Internet for Me. But I Stopped It From Booking My Appointments
articles.author: Amanda Smith
articles.summary: ChatGPT launched its new AI Agent service in July 2025, offering action-taking capabilities for paid users. This service allows users to command an AI chatbot to automate tasks such as ordering food or building financial models, accessible through the 'Agent mode' in the ChatGPT interface.

articles.title: Going Global: MagicLab Makes Its Debut at IFA 2025
articles.author: Magic Lab
articles.summary: MagicLab introduced MagicBot Z1, a high-dynamic bipedal humanoid robot, and MagicDog, a consumer-grade quadruped robot, at IFA Berlin. These innovations showcase MagicLab's leadership in embodied AI.

articles.title: I just watched a robot vacuum pick up a brush and sweep in a corner, and this might be the future of cleaning
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Dreame is introducing the Cyber10 Ultra, a robot vacuum with a mechanical arm that can use different cleaning tools. The Cyber10 Ultra can select from a range of detail tools, which attach to the end of the arm and enable it to perform cleaning tasks. Currently, there's a brush for cleaning into the corners of rooms, and a duster for dusting baseboards.

articles.title: 30 Incredibly Practical Walmart Products Anyone Over The Age Of 25 Should Know About
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of new or interesting household and personal care products. Items include a power bank by Belkin for charging devices, a gel nail kit for salon-quality manicures at home, and a 50-piece tool set for home repairs. These products offer practical solutions and convenience for everyday life.

articles.title: Haier India Partners with Bigg Boss Telugu Season 9 for 6th Consecutive Year to Strengthen Regional Consumer Engagement
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Haier Appliances India is showcasing its latest range of LED TVs, refrigerators, and air conditioners within the Bigg Boss Telugu house. This collaboration aims to demonstrate how Haier's innovative appliances complement modern lifestyles through immersive entertainment, ultimate comfort, smart convenience, and long-lasting freshness.

articles.title: Billionaire YouTuber MrBeast and Ryan Reynolds will soon have something in common: A 'smart' phone company
articles.author: Sohini Paul
articles.summary: YouTuber MrBeast plans to launch a wireless carrier in 2026 through his company, Beast Industries, operating as a Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO). His previous ventures include Feastables, a snack brand launched in 2022, MrBeast Lab which is a toy line introduced in 2024, and Lunchly, launched in 2024, alongside Logan Paul and KSI.

articles.title: Philips Hue Plans To Make All Your Lights Motion Sensors
articles.summary: Philips Hue is introducing MotionAware, a new feature for its smart bulbs. MotionAware will turn the bulbs into motion detectors.

articles.title: Dyson unveils 11 new products: From world's slimmest vacuum to next-gen hair tools
articles.author: Ibt Technology Desk
articles.summary: Dyson introduced several new products including the Dyson PencilVac, the world's slimmest vacuum cleaner, and upgrades to existing lines such as the V8 Cyclone and V16 Piston Animal vacuums. Additionally, Dyson launched the Dyson Omega Nourishing Range, a new line of hair care products using omega-rich oils.

articles.title: Launched This Week: Lava Bold N1, Nikon ZF silver edition, and 5 others
articles.summary: Lava launched the Bold N1 5G smartphone with a 90Hz display and 4K video recording, starting at Rs 7,499. Nikon introduced a silver edition of its Z f mirrorless camera with customizable colors, priced at Rs 1,76,995. Sony launched the IER-EX15C Type-C wired earphones for Rs 2,490. Lexar released the JumpDrive M400 USB 3.0 Flash Drive with 150MB/s read speeds, starting at Rs 600. Unix launched the Pop Beat speaker priced at Rs 599. Zebronics unveiled the Juke Bar 9920 soundbar with Dolby Atmos for Rs 32,999. Stuffcool launched the Nemo 10,000mAh magnetic powerbank for Rs 2,499.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 users will finally get major upgrade 'this month'
articles.author: Mike Lowe
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a more affordable entry point in the S25 series, which ships with One UI 8. The company also revealed the Galaxy Tab S11 and Tab S11 Ultra tablet models. One UI 8, with its enhanced Galaxy AI suite and Android 16 base, will soon be available for the entire Samsung Galaxy S25 range.

articles.title: 'Lightning fast' Android phone gets �200 cut as it drops to its 'lowest price'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: The article suggests that a product is comparable to the Samsung S25, and potentially superior in some aspects. This suggests the Samsung S25 is likely a new or recently launched product.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G with 5,000 mAh battery, HD+ display launched in India: Price, specs and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Lava has launched its new 5G smartphone, Lava Bold N1 5G, powered by a Unisoc chipset and backed by a 5000 mAh battery. It features a 13MP main camera, an HD+ display with up to 90Hz refresh rate, and is available in two storage options: 4GB+64GB and 4GB+128GB, priced at Rs 7,499 and Rs 7,999 respectively. The smartphone will be available for purchase during the Great India Festival Sale on Amazon.in.

articles.title: You can have the iPhone 17 Air. Gimme the Pop Phone instead
articles.author: Roman Loyola
articles.summary: Apple is preparing to unveil the iPhone 17 Air. Native Union has announced the Pop Phone, an audio accessory.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy S25 Fan Edition (FE) loaded with AI, fast charging, and sleek design
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Fan Edition (FE) smartphone, featuring flagship capabilities at an affordable price. The phone offers 8GB RAM, up to 512GB storage, a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, and a triple camera setup with a 50MP main sensor. It runs on Android 16 with One UI 8 and includes Galaxy AI features, with Samsung promising seven years of software and security updates.

articles.title: Sincerely Yours, A New Beauty Brand Rebuilding Trust for Parents While Empowering Personal Care Choices for The Next Generation, Launches at Sephora
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Sincerely Yours, a new skincare brand for teens, has launched its debut collection including cleanser, serum mist, moisturizer, and sunscreen, available exclusively at Sephora. The brand features dermatologist-developed, clean formulas made with input from a teen advisory board and aims to empower personal care choices for the next generation. The launch is supported by a seed investment led by Strand.

articles.title: Forget heated airers, the £10 space-saving gadget to dry washing inside & it's out of sight
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Home Bargains offers the Utility Space Saving Over Door Airer for £9.99, a compact laundry gadget designed for small spaces with 5m of drying space and a 4.5kg capacity. Alternative space-saving laundry solutions can also be found at Aldi and Lidl.

articles.title: I went hands-on with Lenovo's white ThinkPad X9 at IFA, and it's the coolest laptop yet
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: ThinkPad is releasing a new Glacial White colorway for the ThinkPad X9 Aura Edition. This new color option offers a bold aesthetic impression for existing fans.

articles.title: This skincare brand went viral for its unique formula – and it's actually from Yorkshire
articles.author: Marc Reeves
articles.summary: 47 Skin offers skincare products featuring Silver Chitoderm, clinically proven to kill bacteria that cause breakouts. MySweetSmile provides at-home oral care and teeth whitening products designed to be effective and enamel-safe. Simple offers a Wall Pilates challenge via an app, providing personalized workout plans and AI coaching.

articles.title: Just 44 Things That'll Make Everything In Your Home Work A Little Better For You
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of new products designed to improve home organization and convenience. These include items such as adjustable closet doublers, under-sink organizers, curtain rod brackets, LED light strips, door draft stoppers, and various cleaning and organizing solutions, each aimed at simplifying everyday tasks and maximizing space utilization.

articles.title: Roborock's New Lineup at IFA 2025 Includes Its First Robot Lawnmowers, an Ultra-Thin Robot Vacuum and More
articles.author: Ajay Kumar
articles.summary: Roborock is entering the robot lawn mower market with three new models: the RockMow Z1, S1, and RockNeo Q1. The RockMow Z1 is the most advanced, featuring all-wheel drive, steep slope climbing ability, and precise edge trimming. The S1 is designed for ease of use with AI smart mapping, while the RockNeo Q1 shares many similar features, all aimed at providing automated lawn care solutions.

articles.title: This $499 Digital Camera Takes 'Professional' Looking Pictures — And It's Only $133 at Walmart
articles.author: Daniel Donabedian
articles.summary: Walmart offers the NBD Digital 4K HD Camera for $133, marked down from $499 as part of a Walmart Flash Deal. The camera features 48 megapixels, impressive digital zoom, a wide-angle lens, and manual focus, and can record while charging.

articles.title: Smartphone cameras aren't just for photography – they're tools for shopping. The Amazon app just learned a new trick for finding products
articles.author: Hillary K. Grigonis
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new 'Live Lens' feature in its app, which allows users to use their smartphone camera to identify products in real-time and find similar products on Amazon. The AI-powered tool provides a carousel of matching products that can be added to the cart, along with summaries from Amazon's AI assistant, Rufus. The feature is currently rolling out in the US.

articles.title: Samsung's Newest AI Promises: Big Energy Savings, Strange Smart Displays and More
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Samsung is showcasing its AI-driven innovations at IFA, including Bespoke AI enhancements for appliances like washing machines, promising significant energy savings. The Jet Bot Steam Ultra vacuum now features AI object recognition. Furthermore, Samsung introduces the Sound Tower portable speaker and the Movingstyle portable touchscreen TV, expanding its smart home ecosystem beyond TVs.

articles.title: ZTE debuts EUR 250 Nubia Air with IP69K rating and 5,000 mAh battery
articles.summary: ZTE, under its Nubia brand, has launched the Nubia Air smartphone. The device boasts a 5,000mAh battery with AI-powered power-saving, and features IP68/IP69K waterproofing within a 5.9mm thin body.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Neo Debuts with 5,000 mAh Battery, IP69 Rating
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 Neo, a successor to the Edge 50 Neo. The handset features a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, up to 12 GB of RAM and 512 GB storage, and runs Android 15. It also sports a 6.36-inch OLED LTPO display with a 120Hz refresh rate.

articles.title: 26 Everyday Products You'll Start To Feel Naked Without
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Eos launched milkshake-inspired lip balms and a lightweight body lotion that offers 24-hour moisture. Loop introduced noise-reduction earplugs. Simple Modern released a ceramic-lined travel coffee tumbler. Dae launched a nourishing, 3-in-1 dragonfruit styling cream. Al Rehab introduced an alcohol-free roll-on perfume. Takeya offers a stainless-steel water bottle. Anker has released a 3-in-1 charging pad.

articles.title: Sun King has a new brand and logo in move to expand product portfolio
articles.author: Samson Nderi
articles.summary: Sun King introduced a new brand and logo. This move is intended to enable expansion of their product portfolio.

articles.title: Air Conditioning And Heating Solutions
articles.summary: Midea introduces the YL-2037S-B water dispenser, featuring hot, cool, and cold temperature settings with Xpress Cool Technology for efficient cooling. The dispenser prioritizes safety with a child safety lock and overheating protection, and is designed for low maintenance with a rust-resistant stainless steel tank.

articles.title: BMW unveils Neue Klasse iX3 electric SUV with 800 km range
articles.author: ETAuto Desk
articles.summary: BMW unveiled its next-generation electric SUV, the Neue Klasse iX3, which will go on sale in Europe from March 2026, priced at €68,900. The iX3 boasts a driving range of over 800 kilometers and can add 370 km of charge in ten minutes, setting a new benchmark for BMW's EV portfolio.

articles.title: The foldable smartphone's moment is finally arriving
articles.author: Harry McCracken
articles.summary: Samsung's latest model, the Galaxy Z Fold7, has impressed users. Google is shipping the Pixel 10 Pro Fold next month, the first foldable with IP68 water and dust resistance. Honor recently debuted the Magic V5 in Europe, claiming it's the world's thinnest folding phone, while Apple is expected to launch a foldable iPhone in 2026.

articles.title: Lenovo's ThinkBook VertiFlex Concept Laptop Has a Swiveling Screen
articles.author: Julian Chokkattu
articles.summary: Lenovo unveiled the ThinkBook VertiFlex at IFA 2025. This follows Lenovo's previous concept products like a transparent screen laptop and a ThinkBook Flip with a flexible OLED display. A ThinkBook with a rollable OLED screen, initially a concept, is now a purchasable product.

articles.title: Parents rush to Boots as bestselling Childs Farm baby wash drops to just £4 - it's hailed as a 'bath time essential'
articles.author: LAYLA TURNER
articles.summary: Childs Farm has introduced its new Baby Foaming Cloud Wash Cleanser, a 97% natural-origin, sulphate-free formula enriched with aloe vera and cucumber, designed for delicate newborn skin. The dermatologist and paediatrician-approved cleanser is available for £4 in the Boots sale and provides a gentle clean while leaving a soothing scent and long-lasting bubbles.

articles.title: Beko Presents AI-Driven Smart Appliances, Advancing Sustainability and Consumer Convenience
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Beko introduced its new AI-driven smart home appliances at IFA Berlin, featuring technologies like HomeWhiz, AdaptiveWash, and AdaptiveDry. The new Intelligent Laundry Care suite employs SenseWash for fabric care and energy efficiency, while SilentDry tumble dryers offer quiet and efficient drying using AdaptiveDry technology.

articles.title: Waterdrop Welcomes Industry Leader Alexandre Ruberti to Drive Growth in the Americas
articles.summary: Waterdrop, a hydration brand, is revolutionizing the beverage industry. They are launching innovative hydration products.

articles.title: Circle to Search adds continuous translation
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Google announced 'Scroll and translate,' a major upgrade to Circle to Search on Android. The update allows continuous translation as the on-screen content changes across screens and apps. The rollout begins this week with select Samsung Galaxy phones.

articles.title: Lenovo's Innovative Showstopper: Unveiling the Rotating Screen of the Legion Go Gen2 and Other Striking Concepts at Tweakers
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching innovative products, including laptops with rotating screens, updated ThinkPad workstations, and the Legion Go Gen2, a handheld gaming PC with a rotating display.  Accessories like the Legion Go Expansion Dock and Keyboard enhance its functionality, transforming it into a portable workstation. The Legion Go Gen2 features an AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme processor, improved cooling, and refined controllers, addressing user feedback from the original Legion Go.

articles.title: Google's Circle to Search gets smarter with new ‘Scroll and Translate' feature
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is updating its Circle to Search feature with a 'scroll and translate' option for Android devices. This new feature allows users to continuously translate text while scrolling through apps, eliminating the need to restart the translation process with each content change. The update will initially be available on Samsung Galaxy devices.

articles.title: August in Review: 13 Top Consumer Press Releases
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker partnered with Sabrina Carpenter. Instant Pot launched a new small-format lineup. Limited-edition Halloween treats were announced.

articles.title: BMW unveils the Neue Klasse - the first of its next-generation electric vehicles
articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.summary: BMW has revealed the new iX3, the first in its 'Neue Klasse' line of electric vehicles. The 'Neue Klasse' moniker is inspired by the 1962 BMW 1500 saloon.

articles.title: Dawlance Unveils Its Largest Experience Store in Multan
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Dawlance, a subsidiary of Beko group, launched its largest Experience Store in Multan, Pakistan. The store offers a modern, immersive environment where customers can interact with Dawlance appliances such as refrigerators, air conditioners, and washing machines, and test products before purchasing. This launch represents an extension of Dawlance's commitment to providing global experiences and cutting-edge technology to Pakistani homes.

articles.title: 7 Effective Marketing Strategies To Increase White Sumatra Kratom Sales
articles.summary: The article outlines marketing strategies for White Sumatra Kratom, emphasizing the importance of knowing your audience, optimizing SEO, and educating through content. It also highlights the need for trust and transparency, flexible purchasing options, and leveraging email marketing to increase sales and build customer loyalty.

articles.title: Next launches two beauty advent calendars for Christmas 2025 - here's what's inside
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next has launched two beauty advent calendars for Christmas 2025: the 25 Days of Beauty Advent Calendar priced at £95 and the Luxury Beauty Advent Calendar at £185. The 25 Days of Beauty Advent Calendar includes brands such as Emma Hardie, Benefit, and Pixi, while the Luxury Beauty Advent Calendar features high-end brands like MURAD, Clinique, and Elemis.

articles.title: NIQ Releases AI-Powered Shopper Voice on GfKnewron® Consumer at IFA 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NielsenIQ (NIQ) has launched an enhanced version of its GfKnewron® Consumer platform, now including AI-Powered Shopper Voice. This new feature analyzes shopper verbatims to provide brands and retailers with actionable insights, helping them understand consumer buying behaviors and improve customer loyalty and satisfaction. The solution will be on display at IFA in Berlin, on September 5 – 9, 2025.

articles.title: NIQ Releases AI-Powered Shopper Voice on GfKnewron® Consumer at IFA 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NielsenIQ (NIQ) has enhanced its GfKnewron® Consumer platform by integrating AI-Powered Shopper Voice. This enhancement decodes consumer verbatims into actionable insights for brands and retailers. The platform delivers consumer insights based on over 1 billion sales transactions globally.

articles.title: AI Transforms Marketing Landscape as Adoption Reaches Mainstream Status
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: AI is transforming marketing by enhancing personalization, automating content creation, and enabling predictive analytics. Companies are increasingly adopting AI-powered tools for tasks like campaign management, customer service, and social media marketing, leading to more data-driven and efficient strategies.

articles.title: Dozz launches ‘UK first' canned chilled soup
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Dozz, a brand offering chilled, ready-to-eat soup in a can, has launched in the UK. The initial range includes 10 soup flavors in recyclable aluminium cans and will debut at the Lunch Show in London. Dozz is also preparing launches in Germany and other western European countries.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Neo Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of Imminent Launch
articles.author: Bhumish Sheth
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 60 Neo, a new midrange smartphone. It features a compact OLED display, a triple rear camera system, and an upgraded chipset. The launch is expected in Europe soon, followed by India in late September or early October, with a price range of €350–€400 in Europe and ₹28,000–₹32,000 in India.

articles.title: Lazada shoppers embrace AI, but merchants lag in adoption
articles.author: Othel V. Campos
articles.summary: Lazada has launched its 9.9 Mega Brands Sale, emphasizing the role of its AI engine 'Lazzie' in creating personalized shopping experiences. To increase AI adoption among merchants, Lazada introduced new tools, including smart product optimization and listing, AI-powered translations, AI-driven selling funds and real-time assistance.

articles.title: Lenovo's radical PC concepts imagine laptop screens that adapt to you
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced the Smart Motion Concept, a smart multidirectional laptop stand, at IFA 2025. They also demonstrated the VertiFlex concept, allowing a laptop screen to rotate into portrait mode, and the Magic Bay Tiko smart screen. These follow their previously showcased AI Display, featuring AI capabilities and automatic adjustment.

articles.title: Add 1TB of storage to your phone with SanDisk's tiny SSD, now 19% off
articles.author: Gabriela Vatu
articles.summary: SanDisk offers the 1TB Creator Phone SSD, a portable drive designed to attach to the back of a phone. The drive is currently on sale for $109.99, a 19 percent discount from its original price of $134.99.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G Launched in India with 13MP Camera and 5000mAh Battery
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Lava has launched its new budget 5G smartphone, the Lava Bold N1 5G, in the Indian market. The device is priced under ₹8,000 and is aimed at entry-level buyers, offering 5G connectivity, a large display, and a long-lasting battery. It is available in Champagne Gold and Royal Blue colors via Amazon India.

articles.title: European car giant's fight for survival
articles.author: John Mahoney
articles.summary: BMW has unveiled the new iX3 electric car, a mid-size battery-powered SUV, as the first of a new family of 'Neue Klasse' next-generation BMWs. The iX3 features BMW's latest sixth-generation EV powertrain, achieving an impressive 805km range on a single charge. It also boasts new BMW Panoramic iDrive tech with a 17.9-inch infotainment screen and a full-width 43.3-inch customisable screen. The car is scheduled to arrive in Australia next year, with an estimated price starting from $100,000.

articles.title: Huawei unveils $2,500 trifold smartphone
articles.author: Vn Express
articles.summary: Huawei launched its Mate XTs, a new trifold smartphone, in China with a price starting at 17,999 yuan (US$2,520). The Mate XTs features two hinges allowing it to expand into a tablet, Huawei's Kirin 9020 chip, HarmonyOS system which boosting performance by 36%, and Huawei's new M-Pen 3 stylus.

articles.title: Pallavi Joshi calls Shah Rukh Khan's movies 'image-driven' and reveals why he is not 'fit' for her films: 'When you cast…'
articles.summary: The Galaxy A17 5G is now available, offering users enhanced capabilities for improved performance.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's Cooking Show Flop is 'a Problem' for Online Shop
articles.author: Jack Royston
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's Netflix show "With Love, Meghan" aimed to promote her lifestyle brand, As Ever. Season 1 promoted flower sprinkles which garnered attention, and after stock sold out quickly, Meghan expanded her range to include wine. Season 2, however, failed to effectively showcase As Ever products due to filming timelines, presenting a missed opportunity for product placement. A Christmas special is scheduled, offering another chance to integrate and promote her actual products.

articles.title: Adobe Premiere Is Coming to the iPhone (Along With Privacy Concerns)
articles.author: Jake Peterson
articles.summary: Adobe is launching Premiere, its flagship video editing software, as a mobile app for iPhone on Sept. 30, with an Android version in development. The free-to-download app includes multi-track timeline, automatic captions, subtitles, layers for video, audio, text, and 4K HDR support.

articles.title: Candy's Multi Wash, a washing machine with three drums, is the laundry upgrade I didn't know I needed
articles.author: Spencer Hart
articles.summary: Candy has launched Multi Wash, a washing machine featuring three separate drums each running its own programme. The company also introduced the ProWash 750, equipped with a user-friendly interface and automatic detergent dosing.

articles.title: I tried the Samsung Galaxy Tab S11, and it's a productivity powerhouse that takes the fight to iPadOS 26
articles.author: Jamie Richards
articles.summary: Samsung announced the launch of the Galaxy Tab S11 and Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra. The Galaxy Tab S11 features an 11-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset, and redesigned S-Pen, while both tablets run One UI 8 based on Android 16 with new AI features. The Galaxy Tab S11 starts at $799.

articles.title: Dyson just released the vacuum we actually wanted – an upgraded V8 that costs basically the same as the original
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the V8 Cyclone, an upgraded version of their best-selling V8 stick vacuum. The V8 Cyclone offers 30% more suction and 50% longer runtime than the original V8 while maintaining a similar price point in the UK at £349.99 / AU$649.

articles.title: I've just seen Dyson's surprise new robot vacuum, and it looks great... but why is it so enormous?
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Dyson has announced the Spot+Scrub Ai robot vacuum, slated for release in 2026. This new robot vacuum features AI mapping and stain detection, roller mopping, and a bagless auto-empty dock with water tanks and mop cleaning. It can identify nearly 200 objects and substances using an AI-powered camera and dirt-illuminating laser.

articles.title: There's finally a new flagship Dyson, and it solves all my biggest problems with stick vacuums
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Dyson has announced the new flagship V16 Piston Animal stick vacuum. It features onboard dust compaction via a 'CleanCompaktor' bin and hands-free attachment swapping. There's also a Submarine version with added mopping floorhead.

articles.title: 5G Phone Under Rs 6,750: Lava Bold N1 5G With 13MP Dual Rear Camera Launched In India
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles has launched the Lava Bold N1 5G in India, featuring a 90Hz HD+ display, Unisoc T765 chipset, 4GB RAM, up to 128GB storage, and a 13MP AI dual rear camera. The smartphone is priced starting at Rs 7,499 and will be available on Amazon with early deals during the Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025.

articles.title: TCL unveils NxtPaper 60 Ultra phone with 7.2-inch screen
articles.summary: TCL unveiled the NxtPaper 60 Ultra smartphone, featuring eye-care technology, at IFA 2025 in Berlin. The company also introduced the NxtPaper 5G Junior smartphone and the Movetime MT48 smartwatch for kids.

articles.title: What Laptop Generation Means: Easy Guide for Intel, AMD & MacBooks
articles.author: Rukayat Badmus
articles.summary: The article discusses the importance of understanding processor generations in laptops, covering Windows laptops with Intel and AMD processors, as well as MacBooks with Apple Silicon chips (M1, M2, M3). It also reviews the HP ZBook Firefly 14 G7, Lenovo Legion 5, HP EliteBook 845 G8, 15-inch MacBook Air with M3 chip and MacBook Pro with M2 chip. The article highlights how newer generations and chips offer improved speed, battery life, and future-proofing for devices.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G Price, Specifications, Features and Sale Details Revealed, Know Everything About Latest Entry-Level Smartphone Launched in India
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles has launched the Lava Bold N1 5G smartphone in India, targeting budget-conscious users. It features a 6.75-inch HD+ display, a 5,000mAh battery, and a 13MP AI rear camera. The smartphone is available in two storage variants and is priced starting at INR 6,749 with special launch offers and will go on sale starting from the first day of Amazon Great Indian Festival Early Deals.

articles.title: ⚡Lava Bold N1 5G Launched in India; Check Price and Specs
articles.summary: Lava launched the Bold N1 5G smartphone in India, targeting budget-conscious users. This entry-level 5G phone features a 6.75-inch HD+ display, UNISOC T765 processor, 5,000mAh battery, and 13MP AI rear camera, with prices starting at INR 6,749 with offers.

articles.title: World's First AI Data Analyst "Ada" Ranked #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt  Sep. 5, 2025 08:00
articles.summary: Ada, the world's first AI data analyst, launched and secured the #1 Product of the Day ranking on Product Hunt. Ada automates complex data workflows, leverages Large Language Models (LLMs), and transforms raw data into actionable insights. It generates reports, unifies data sources, predicts trends, and facilitates human-AI collaboration.

articles.title: NexLawn Unveils Arm-Equipped Robotic Mowers and Smart Yard Lineup at IFA 2025
articles.author: Nex Lawn
articles.summary: NexLawn, a brand under MOVA, debuted three robotic yard care products at IFA 2025: the VIDAR Series, VIDAR AWD Series, and the Master X Vison. These models offer advancements in safety, intelligence, and versatility. NexLawn also plans to expand its ecosystem with smart garden tools and robotic pool cleaners.

articles.title: Lenovo's Legion Go 2 adds a big OLED screen to battle the Steam Deck
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Lenovo is preparing to release the Legion Go S, a second-generation device in the Legion Go line. This new version is expected to be smaller and more affordable, directly competing with other similar products.

articles.title: Model Y L提车进行时_手机网易网
articles.author: 特斯拉
articles.summary: Tesla promotes its Model Y L, highlighting its attractive design, long-range all-wheel-drive capabilities, and spacious interior. The company encourages potential customers to visit a store for a test drive and experience the vehicle's upgrades.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: St. Dominic's Abi Mandrell aims for a stellar senior season
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Swig is opening a new 'dirty soda' shop in St. Peters, Missouri. The shop will feature customizable drinks.

articles.title: TVS NTorq 150 Walkaround- Sharper, Smarter & Sportier Than Ever
articles.summary: TVS has launched the NTorq 150 scooter featuring bold design upgrades, advanced features, and improved performance. The NTorq 150 aims to redefine the sporty scooter experience in India and is being compared to competitors like the Hero Xoom 160.

articles.title: Mohan sisters star in Sunsilk's ‘Nachdi Kudi' film as brand marks fresh new era
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Sunsilk has relaunched with a brand refresh featuring modern packaging, a refreshed design, and updated storytelling. As part of this, Sunsilk and the Mohan Sisters launched 'Nachdi Kudi,' a music video that achieved an Asian World Record, celebrating music, dance, and self-expression. This campaign reflects Sunsilk's new identity and its commitment to innovation and vibrant self-expression.

articles.title: Lenovo's new white ThinkPad X9 is the coolest laptop announced at IFA
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: ThinkPad X9 Aura Edition has a new Glacial White colorway.

articles.title: NEWS: Lenovo Unveils Full Portfolio of AI-Powered Devices and Experiences Across Consumer, Business, and Mobile
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: At Lenovo Innovation World 2025, Lenovo unveiled its newest portfolio of AI-powered innovations. This represents the company's latest advancements in artificial intelligence offerings.

articles.title: Motorola unveils Edge 60 Neo, G06 and G06 Power phones
articles.summary: Motorola has launched three new smartphones: the Motorola Edge 60 Neo, Moto G06, and G06 Power at the Innovation World event in Berlin. The Motorola Edge 60 Neo features a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC and a 5,000mAh battery with 68W fast charging.

articles.title: Dyson unveils its slimmest vacuum cleaner PencilVac, comes with new Hyperdymium motor
articles.summary: Dyson is expanding its product line with the launch of Dyson PencilVac, its slimmest vacuum cleaner, powered by Dyson's Hyperdymium motor. Other new products include the V8 Cyclone cordless vacuum, V16 Piston Animal vacuum, Clean+Wash Hygiene wet and dry cleaner, Spot+Scrub Ai robot vacuum, HushJet Purifier Compact air purifier, Supersonic r hair dryer, and Airwrap Co-anda 2x multi-styler, each with upgraded features and performance.

articles.title: Lava launches new 5G entry segment phone Bold N1 5G with Android 15
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Bold N1 5G smartphone targeting entry-level buyers. The phone features a 6.75 inch HD+ display, a 5,000 mAh battery, Unisoc T765 processor, and a 13 MP rear camera. It is priced starting at ₹7,499 and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: Top Walmart Products That Quietly Solve Problems
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new product offerings designed to enhance everyday life. Among them is a Shark robot vacuum and mop, priced at $248 (originally $379.99), promising precise home cleaning. Additionally, there's a coffee maker that is priced at $190 and that accommodates both drip and pod brewing.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G Launch Live Streaming: Watch Online Telecast of Launch of New Smartphone From Lava Mobiles; Know Price, Specifications and Other Details
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles is launching its new Lava Bold N1 5G smartphone today in India. The launch event will be live-streamed on YouTube, revealing the phone's price, specifications, and features. The smartphone will be available in Royal Blue and Champagne Gold and might include a dual camera setup with a 13MP AI camera.

articles.title: Saltlux, a South Korean artificial intelligence (AI) company, announced on the 5th that its U.S. sub..
articles.author: A Prescription
articles.summary: Saltlux's U.S. subsidiary's AI agent service "Goover" reached 1 million users three months after its launch in June. The company is also developing and introducing the on-premises "Goober Enterprise" to address security concerns and planning to upgrade Goover with the more advanced LMM 'Lucia 3.0' to produce images and videos.

articles.title: ‘Super Robot Wars Y' Switch Review: An Excellent Entry For Newcomers
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: 'Super Robot Wars Y' is a new game launched with great new additions. It is a new 'Super Robot Wars' game after a long time.

articles.title: NEWS: Lenovo Unveils Full Portfolio of AI-Powered Devices and Experiences Across Consumer, Business, and Mobile
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced its latest portfolio of AI-powered innovations including high-performance PCs, intelligent tablets, immersive gaming devices, and Motorola smartphones. New products include ThinkBook VertiFlex Concept, Lenovo Smart Motion Concept, ThinkPad P16 Gen 3, ThinkPad P1 Gen 8, ThinkPad P16v Gen 3, ThinkPad P16s i Gen 4, ThinkPad P14s i Gen 6, ThinkPad X9 Aura Edition, ThinkVision™ P40WD-40 and ThinkPad Smart Dock portfolio. Lenovo is also piloting the development of on-device AI assistants through its AI Fast Start services program.

articles.title: Motorola Unveils New Smartphone with More Than Two and a Half Days of Battery Life
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G66j 5G smartphone in Japan on July 10th, 2025, emphasizing exceptional battery performance. The phone is designed to last over two and a half days for typical users, featuring optimized software, 5G efficiency, energy-efficient display technology, and a balanced processor choice.

articles.title: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander Signature Shoe Sells Out Fast!
articles.summary: Converse launched Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's debut signature shoe, SHAI 001 'BUTTER'. The launch included a limited global release across Converse.com, the Nike SNKRS App, and select retailers, contributing to its rapid sell-out due to high demand. The SHAI 001 was designed to move with the 'fluid, precise, and fearless' style and it was billed as 'sculptural yet functional, expressive yet engineered'.

articles.title: 2026 Genesis G80 price and specs: 5 Series rival gets stealthy new Black edition
articles.summary: Genesis is introducing a new 'Black edition' of its G80 model for 2026. This edition offers a stealthy aesthetic and competes with the BMW 5 Series.

articles.title: 2026 Genesis G80 price and specs: 5 Series rival gets stealthy new Black edition
articles.summary: Genesis launched a new twin-turbo V6-powered 'Black edition' of the G80 model. The flagship 3.5T variant also receives more standard equipment.

articles.title: Lenovo Unveils Full Portfolio of AI-Powered Devices and Experiences Across Consumer, Business, and Mobile
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced its new portfolio of AI-powered products at Lenovo Innovation World 2025. The new lineup includes high-performance PCs, intelligent tablets, immersive gaming devices, and Motorola smartphones, all integrating generative AI and hybrid intelligence.

articles.title: I went hands-on with Lenovo's new Yoga Tab and Idea Tab Plus — here's who they're for
articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching two new Android tablets this month: the Lenovo Yoga Tab, a creator-focused mid-range tablet priced at $550, and the Lenovo Idea Tab Plus, a budget productivity tablet starting at $270. The Yoga Tab features a 3.2K display and preloaded Adobe Creative Suite, while the Idea Tab Plus offers basic productivity and content consumption with a 2.5K display and multiple color options.

articles.title: This stand can automatically lift, tilt, and turn your laptop toward you
articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
articles.summary: Lenovo announced the "Smart Motion Concept laptop stand" at IFA 2025. The stand automatically adjusts a laptop's position for ergonomic viewing and features face tracking via the webcam, built-in cooling fans, and a USB hub. It can be controlled by a remote or gestures using Lenovo's AI Ring.

articles.title: LG Teases Arrival of Next-gen Cinebeam – a New Era of Portable Home Entertainment – on the Uae's Horizon
articles.summary: LG Electronics is preparing to launch its next-generation portable projector, the LG CineBeam S. The CineBeam S is designed to provide an immersive viewing experience with breathtaking visual performance, dynamic audio, and seamless integration of LG's webOS platform. The projector features a compact and elegant design with a rotating handle for easy transport and angle adjustments.

articles.title: LG Showcases Advanced Commercial Laundry Solutions at Clean Show 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics is showcasing its new commercial laundry solutions at Clean Show 2025, including the PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY lineup with AI technology that optimizes wash/dry times and reduces energy consumption.  The showcase also features Laundry Crew 3.0 and Smart API, which streamlines management for commercial laundry operations. The company aims to improve its position in the North American commercial laundry market with these new product offerings.

articles.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 50 Series Laptops Set a New Standard with AI-powered Tools for Students
articles.summary: NVIDIA has launched the GeForce RTX 50 Series laptops, targeting students for learning, creativity, and gaming. These laptops offer powerful performance, advanced AI capabilities, and portability, and are now available at leading retailers.

articles.title: Score an Exceptional Smart Lock for Your Front Door at Just $164 Today!
articles.summary: Yale is offering its Smart Lock for $164, emphasizing enhanced security through encryption and keyless entry via smartphone, keypad, or voice control. The smart lock integrates with smart home ecosystems and provides remote access, activity monitoring, and easy installation.

articles.title: Lenovo unveils AI-powered PCs, others at innovation world 2025
articles.author: Christabel Ndoeche
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced its latest AI-powered devices at Lenovo Innovation World 2025, including the ThinkBook VertiFlex Concept, ThinkVision P40WD-40 monitor, Lenovo Legion Go handheld gaming PC, and Yoga and Idea Tab Plus tablets. Motorola unveiled the Motorola Edge 60 neo, moto g06, and moto g06 power smartphones with moto AI features. Lenovo also unveiled its AI Fast Start services program for organizations.

articles.title: TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra: Revolutionizing Smartphone Eye-Care and Performance
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: TCL introduced the NXTPAPER 60 Ultra smartphone at IFA 2025. The phone features a 7.2-inch display with NXTPAPER 4.0 technology for eye-care, AI enhancements for reading and writing, and TCL's MuseFilm imaging technology. It is equipped with a MediaTek chipset and expansive memory.

articles.title: Best retro games consoles 2020: Go back to the future
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Sony and Microsoft may be developing new generations of gaming consoles. Nintendo's Switch continues to be available.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL: Luxury, Speed & Smarts
articles.summary: Google's latest phone features a sleek frame, smooth glass back, and splash-proof design. The phone is described as classy and a joy to hold.

articles.title: Digitalzone Launches DZ One: The First Free Agentic AI Co-Worker for B2B Demand Generation
articles.author: Digitalzone
articles.summary: DZ One, a new platform described as 'ChatGPT for demand generation,' allows marketers to build campaigns and pull reports through conversation. It aims to solve longstanding challenges marketers face and give time back to marketers using Agentic AI.

articles.title: Huawei unveils cutting-edge Mate XTs with Innovative trifold design
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XTs, a next-generation tri-foldable smartphone, featuring a Kirin 9020 chipset and HarmonyOS 5.1. The device boasts a 10.2-inch X-True display that transforms into multiple formats and includes a 50MP main camera with advanced AI features. Pre-orders began in China, with sales commencing on September 12.

articles.title: Tecno dey bring slim phone wey fit make you smile!
articles.author: Yusuf Ibrahim
articles.summary: Tecno launched the Tecno Slim smartphone at IFA 2025, available in 4G (5.93mm) and 5G (5.95mm) variants. The company also unveiled the Megabook K15S, K16S and flagship Megabook S14 laptops, along with the MegaPad Pro AI tablet featuring a 12-inch 2K display.

articles.title: The Jojoba Company's new $39.95 booster range is going viral for tackling fine lines and scars
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: The Jojoba Company has launched its new Jojoba Boost range, a targeted collection of three boosters for addressing skin concerns such as dullness, dehydration, fine lines, and scarring. The range features Jojoba Boost Skin Renewal, Jojoba Boost Skin Barrier Support and Jojoba Boost Super Antioxidant that is designed to slot seamlessly into any skincare routine.

articles.title: This Amazon Lens upgrade lets you scan a product IRL and find it online in one click
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Lens Live, an interactive feature for the Amazon Shopping app. Lens Live allows users to scan items with their phone camera to find similar products on Amazon, enhancing the existing Amazon Lens tool with real-time scanning capabilities.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Steam Robot Vacuum That Clears 4.5 cm Obstacles
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched its new robot vacuum cleaner 'Bespoke AI Steam' at IFA 2025. The robot features high-temperature steam cleaning, AI-powered mobility to overcome obstacles, and AI-based liquid recognition for targeted cleaning. Samsung aims to gain an edge over competitors like Roborock with this premium appliance.

articles.title: Apple has reportedly launched an AI chatbot, but it's not for the iPhone 17 (or you)
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The company has launched a new beta feature for its retail employees. This launch occurs amidst competitors investing heavily in customer-facing AI tools.

articles.title: Yutong Bus Link+ Empowers Fleets with Intelligent Management and Higher Operational Efficiency
articles.summary: Yutong Link+ provides smart lifecycle management solutions. The service is powered by AI and big data for global customers.

articles.title: Over 15,800 Shoppers Call This Hand Cream Their 'Holy Grail'
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: L'Occitane's 20% Organic Shea Butter Hand Cream is available for $32 on Amazon.  The cream is promoted for its hydrating benefits, non-greasy finish, and subtle jasmine and ylang-ylang scent. User reviews highlight its effectiveness in treating dry and cracked skin.

articles.title: I Always Keep This French Hand Cream That Shoppers Call a ‘Holy Grail' in my Purse
articles.author: Us Weekly
articles.summary: L'Occitane's 20% Organic Shea Butter Hand Cream is highlighted for its hydrating benefits and non-greasy finish. The cream contains beta-glucan to lock in moisture, leaving hands soft and smooth. Positive reviews emphasize its effectiveness in treating dry, cracked skin.

articles.title: Naver and Kurly alliance challenges Coupang's dominance in South Korea's e-commerce
articles.author: Jeong Jae-Hwon
articles.summary: Kurly has launched 'Kurly N Mart' on Naver Smart Store, marking its entry into an external platform. This new service will allow Kurly to expand its product portfolio from fresh food and beauty products to include household and kitchen items. Kurly's logistics subsidiary has also joined Naver's logistics consortium, enabling stable overnight delivery services.

articles.title: Swiggy rolls out ‘Giftables' for instant festive gifting
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched Giftables, a new category within its app, designed to simplify personalized gifting. The service, currently live in Bangalore and expanding to other metros, offers curated gifts across categories like chocolates, flowers, electronics and more. Giftables also allows for personalized combinations and deliveries within 10-60 minutes.

articles.title: World record unlocked! Sunsilk's bold new chapter with the Mohan Sisters
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Sunsilk has relaunched with a brand refresh that includes modern packaging, a fresh design, and updated storytelling. This launch features a cultural campaign centered around the 'Nachdi Kudi' music video and the introduction of 'Bouncenatyam', showcasing the brand's commitment to innovation and vibrant self-expression.

articles.title: Bensedin 10mg express shipping – order with next-day arrival
articles.summary: Bensedin 10mg is available with express shipping, ensuring next-day delivery. This service is designed for prompt access to the medication, providing a seamless experience.

articles.title: ‘Never-before-seen': Dyson unveils five new products at IFA in Berlin
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Dyson has introduced the V16 Piston Animal cordless vacuum cleaner with a dual conical cleaner head that prevents hair tangling, available September 5 for $1599. They also launched the V16 Piston Animal Submarine, a wet and dry version with upgraded wet roller head, alongside the Dyson HushJet Purifier Compact and the Dyson Spot+Scrub Ai robot.

articles.title: LG Pitches AI ‘Orchestra' to European Consumers at IFA 2025
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching several new products and services at IFA 2025, including the Signature OLED T wireless transparent TV, a range of AI-driven appliances customized for European households (such as washer-dryer combos), and the 'Schpilraum' mobility solution that integrates vehicles and living spaces. These introductions represent LG's strategic focus on tangible innovation and market-ready solutions to compete in the European market.

articles.title: We Tried 7 New Dyson Products 3 Days Before Their Global Unveiling. Here's Our Review
articles.author: Yap Wan Xiang
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new lineup of products, including the Dyson PencilVac, a lightweight vacuum; the Dyson V8 Cyclone Cordless Vacuum, a refreshed classic; the Dyson V16 Piston Animal vacuum; the Dyson Clean+Wash Hygiene wet cleaner; the Dyson HushJet Purifier Compact; the Dyson Spot+Scrub AI Robot; and the Dyson Airwrap Co-anda 2x hair styler. These products feature innovative technologies and improvements over previous models, designed to enhance cleaning performance, air purification, and hair styling capabilities.

articles.title: Roborock's New Lineup at IFA 2025 Includes Its First Robot Lawnmowers, an Ultra-Thin Robot Vacuum ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Roborock introduced its first lineup of robot lawnmowers at IFA 2025. This launch places Roborock in competition with companies like Eufy and Husqvarna in the robot lawnmower market.

articles.title: 尼康Zf推出银色版本，还有更多自定义色彩_手机网易网
articles.author: 摄影笔记
org: 尼康全画幅微单数码相机
articles.summary: Nikon has released a silver edition of its Zf full-frame mirrorless digital camera, featuring a classic film camera design. Three new advanced color options, including Cognac Brown, Lake Green Blue, and Misty Rose Pink, have also been introduced. A future firmware update will add a film grain function to the Zf, providing users with new creative options.

articles.title: Chinese home appliance manufacturer expands into new markets
articles.author: Fan Feifei
articles.summary: Dreame Technology, a Chinese intelligent home appliance manufacturer, has expanded its product line beyond cleaning appliances into household appliances and wearable devices by unveiling over 30 new products like televisions, air conditioners, refrigerators, washing machines, robotic vacuum cleaners and sweeping robots. Their robotic vacuum cleaners feature AI-powered obstacle recognition and intelligent path planning.

articles.title: Sir James Dyson unveils new AI robot vacuum in a bid to help households to ...
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A tech giant showcased the world's slimmest vacuum cleaner at an event in Berlin. This indicates a product unveiling or release by the company.

articles.title: Narwal Makes Deep Cleaning Effortless with Game-Changing Lineup at IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Narwal, a global leader in intelligent floor care, is showcasing its evolving product philosophy at IFA 2025. This includes groundbreaking robotics and an expanded ecosystem of floor care tools, signifying the introduction of new cleaning solutions.

articles.title: Huawei's New Tri-Foldable Device Unveiled: Will It Launch Outside Of China?
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Huawei is launching its second-generation tri-foldable device. This launch precedes Samsung's expected entry into the tri-foldable device market this year.

articles.title: Google's New Star-Studded Marketing For Its Pixel Lineup
articles.author: Anshel Sag
articles.summary: Google announced the Pixel 10 series, featuring the Tensor G5 chip for enhanced AI capabilities like Magic Cue and Voice Translate. The Pixel Watch 4 introduces fitness coach features, improved sensors, and satellite messaging. Additionally, the Pixel Buds 2a were launched, offering a streamlined audio experience at a lower price point.

articles.title: Circle to Search Is One of My Favorite AI Tools. Shame It's Not on the ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google Search offers an intuitive AI tool, currently available only on Android phones, suggesting a new feature launch or product update for the Android platform.

articles.title: Nubia Air Unveiled at IFA 2025 With a Slim 5.9mm Profile and a Big Battery
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: ZTE introduced its newest smartphone, Nubia Air, at IFA 2025. The smartphone features an ultra-slim design at 5.9mm and weighs 172g.

articles.title: The new BMW iX3 – First of a new era. (BMW - Bayerische Motoren Werke AG)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: BMW is launching the new iX3, marking the start of a new era for the company. The iX3 is a new product being introduced by BMW.

articles.title: Anker Innovation\u2019s CEO Steven Yang took stage at IFA 2025 to discuss Anker\u2019s future
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Anker Innovations, parent company to Anker, Eufy, and Soundcore, revealed a new product portfolio at IFA 2025. The brands aim to 'ignite new possibilities' with their latest offerings.

articles.title: Fire TV Stick rival drops its smart TV with 'crisp and clear' picture to just �209
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Customers are repurchasing Roku TVs in different sizes, finding it an easy choice. This suggests positive reception and continued availability of the Roku TV product line.

articles.title: Samsung's new extremely expensive robot vacuum is a cleaner and security guard in one
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: IFA 2025 showcased a variety of new AI-powered technologies.  Among the new products are AI fridges and AI washing machines, highlighting the integration of artificial intelligence in appliances.

articles.title: SanDisk launches WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD in India: Price, features and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: SanDisk has released the WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD in India. The new drive is engineered to speed up AI-powered workflows and handle demanding tasks like 4K and 8K video editing. SanDisk reports that it offers up to 30% faster performance.

articles.title: Dreame's New Stair-Climbing and Arm-Equipped Robot Vacuums Take Aim at Eufy and Roborock
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dreame is developing the Cyber X robot vacuum, a concept product capable of climbing stairs and sorting items. PCMag colleagues witnessed these features in action.

articles.title: BMW, the anti-Tesla, is playing the long game on EVs
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: BMW is preparing to unveil its electric iX3 SUV. This SUV will feature 'Neue Klasse' technology. The iX3 aims to compete with rivals such as BYD.

articles.title: A unique spirit is causing a buzz among drinkers — literally
articles.author: Macomb Daily
articles.summary: Tingala, a Colorado-made spirit, offers a unique sensory experience with cinnamon and allspice aromas and flavors, transitioning from spicy notes to other flavors. Demand for Tingala soared, leading to a complete sell-out.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G with 5,000 mAh battery, HD+ display launched in India: Price, specs and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Bold N1 5G smartphone, expanding its 5G series. The phone features a Unisoc chipset, a 5000 mAh battery, a 13MP main camera, and an HD+ display.

articles.title: Jonas Bros. pop-up experience debuts in LA
articles.summary: Jonas Bros. launched a pop-up experience in Los Angeles. The experience features exclusive merchandise inspired by the L.A. Dodgers and photo opportunities.

articles.title: Auto review: 2025 Genesis G80 delivers a couch-like ride
articles.author: Marc D. Grasso
articles.summary: Genesis launched the 2025 G80, a luxury sedan prioritizing comfort and design. The G80 features a 3.5-liter, 375 horsepower twin-turbocharged V-6 engine, 27-inch OLED instrument cluster and Navigation, and Bang & Olufsen premium Audio system as standard.
